privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.intro: We collect the following types of information:
items: Account Information: Username, name, role (student/teacher/class representative)
Learning Data: Homework submissions, grades, learning progress
System Logs: Login records, operation logs (excluding sensitive information)
Device Information: IP address, browser type, device identifiers

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide and improve educational management services
Personalize learning experience and content recommendations
Generate learning statistics and progress reports
Ensure system security and prevent abuse
Provide customer support services

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We only share information in the following situations:
items: Share necessary learning data within the same class (such as homework completion status)
Provide statistical information required for class management to teachers and class representatives
Comply with legal requirements or cooperate with law enforcement investigations
Other situations with your explicit consent

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We take multiple security measures to protect your information:
items: Use SSL encryption to transmit sensitive data
Regularly backup data and store in secure environments
Limit employee access to personal information
Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability scans
Implement strict access control and authentication

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: View and update your account information
Request deletion of your personal data (within legal limits)
Export your learning data
Refuse certain data processing activities
Report data processing issues to us

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience, including remembering login status, personalized settings, and analyzing website usage. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may periodically update this privacy policy. For major changes, we will notify users in advance through platform notifications or email. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us through:
items: Email: privacy@hwsystem.com
Address: No.1 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian District, Beijing, Technology Building, 15th Floor

notice.title: Important Notice:
notice.content: This platform is designed for educational purposes, and we pay special attention to protecting the privacy of minor users. If you are under 18, please use this service with guardian consent.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read the following terms carefully. Using our service indicates that you agree to these terms

service.title: Service Description
service.content: The Homework Management System (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") is an online platform for educational institutions, providing homework management, progress tracking, and class collaboration features for students, teachers, and class representatives.

account.title: User Registration and Account
items: Users must provide true and accurate registration information
Each user can only register one account
Users are responsible for protecting account security and must not share account information with others
Contact us immediately if account theft is discovered
Users are responsible for all activities conducted using their account

conduct.title: User Code of Conduct
conduct.intro: When using the Service, users must not:
items: Upload, publish, or disseminate illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or other inappropriate content
Infringe upon others' intellectual property rights, privacy rights, or other legitimate rights
Engage in any activities that may damage, disable, overload, or impair servers
Attempt unauthorized access to systems or other users' accounts
Use automated tools or scripts to interfere with normal service
Complete homework for others or assist in academic misconduct

integrity.title: Academic Integrity
integrity.intro: This platform is committed to maintaining an academic integrity environment:
items: Students should complete homework independently and must not plagiarize or use ghostwriters
Sharing homework answers or assisting others in cheating is prohibited
Teachers should fairly evaluate student homework without favoritism
The platform has the right to take appropriate measures when academic misconduct is discovered

ip.title: Intellectual Property
items: The Service's software, interface design, trademarks, etc. are protected by intellectual property law
User-uploaded content remains owned by users but grants us usage license
Users guarantee that uploaded content does not infringe third-party intellectual property rights
We have the right to immediately delete and pursue liability when infringing content is discovered

availability.title: Service Availability
items: We strive to ensure continuous service availability but do not guarantee 100% uptime
Regular maintenance and system upgrades may cause temporary service interruptions
Important maintenance activities will be notified to users in advance
We are not liable for service interruptions caused by force majeure

backup.title: Data Backup and Recovery
items: We regularly backup user data to prevent data loss
Users should also backup important data themselves
Data recovery services will be provided on a best-effort basis but complete recovery is not guaranteed
Users are recommended to regularly export important learning records

payment.title: Fees and Payment
items: Basic features are provided free to all users
Advanced features may require paid subscription
All fees are priced in RMB and support multiple payment methods
Refund policy will be clearly explained at time of purchase

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
items: The Service is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties
We are not responsible for users' learning outcomes or teaching effectiveness
To the maximum extent permitted by law, our liability is limited to service fees
Users should bear the risks of using the service themselves

termination.title: Service Termination
items: Users can stop using the service and delete their account at any time
Users who violate the terms of service may have their service suspended or terminated
Reasonable time will be provided to export data before service termination
Certain data may be retained for a period as required by law

legal.title: Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
items: These terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China
Disputes arising from these terms should first be resolved through friendly negotiation
If negotiation fails, disputes shall be submitted to the jurisdiction of Beijing Haidian District People's Court

modifications.title: Terms Modification
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Major modifications will be notified to users through platform announcements or email. Modified terms take effect from the date of publication, and continued use of the service indicates agreement to the modified terms.

contact.intro: If you have any questions or need help, please contact us:

Address: No.1 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian District, Beijing, Technology Building, 15th Floor
